label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_024
content:
## 2024-09-25 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 9579902
- Unique source IPs: 1278
- Unique destination IPs: 4992
- Average flow duration (sec): 16.1
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 81.0
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 14.6
- ICMP percentage: 0.7
- Long lived flows greater than 1 hour: 181
- East-West traffic percentage: 62.4

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 2783941
- Unique domains: 73126
- NXDOMAIN responses: 5416
- DGA suspected domains: 4
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 2795
- Average response time (ms): 4.9
- Cache hit percentage: 92.2
- TXT record queries: 468
- PTR queries: 11562

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 724
- Blocked by IPS: 149
- Signature matches: 621
- Anomaly detections: 11
- Severity critical: 3
- Severity high: 12
- Severity medium: 53
- Severity low: 424
- Top signatures: 
  - ET POLICY curl User-Agent Outbound
  - ET EXPLOIT Apache Log4j RCE Attempt
  - ET MALWARE CnC Beacon Activity
- False positive rate percentage: 15.7

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 5.42
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 1.69
- WAN peak (Gbps): 7.87
- LAN core utilization percentage: 46.6
- DMZ utilization percentage: 32.7
- VPN concentrator sessions: 259
- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 2.14
- Top talker IP: 10.39.11.1
- Top talker bytes (GB): 37.4

### Bgp Changes
- Prefix announcements: 2
- Prefix withdrawals: 1
- AS path changes: 2
- Route flaps: 1
- Peer sessions established: 4
- Peer sessions down: 1
- Max prefix warnings: 1
- Communities changed: 1

### Tls Cert Transparency
- CT logs monitored: 5
- New entries for org domains: 4
- Suspicious issuances: 0
- Expired certificates in use: 1
- TLS 1.0 connections: 13
- TLS 1.1 connections: 20
- TLS 1.2 connections: 71708
- TLS 1.3 connections: 138043
- Weak cipher usage: 4

### Infrastructure
- Netflow-collector-01:
  - CPU percentage: 40
  - Memory percentage: 57
  - Disk percentage: 73
- Dns-resolver-01:
  - CPU percentage: 36
  - Memory percentage: 52
  - Cache size (GB): 2.3
- Ids-sensor-01:
  - CPU percentage: 39
  - Memory percentage: 56
  - PPS: 99998
- Ids-sensor-02:
  - CPU percentage: 37
  - Memory percentage: 57
  - PPS: 107439
- Border-router-01:
  - CPU percentage: 18
  - Memory percentage: 45
  - Interface errors: 5

### Events
- DNS: TXT record burst from vpn-pool — added to watchlist
- TLS audit: TLS 1.0 connection on partner-gateway — waiver in place
- IDS signature ET SCAN tuned: added exception for scanner

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-25. 9579902 flows analyzed. 2783941 DNS queries. 724 IDS alerts (3 critical, 12 high). WAN avg 5.42/1.69 Gbps in/out. 2 BGP announcements.
